name: Reverberate (Koobysnack, Tei Hek, esaltzherr)
description:
Reverberate is a game that utilizes darkness and echolocation. The player must use echolocation in order to see objects in the world, as well as ping and activate stations. Once all stations are activated, the player wins the game. However, there are agents patrolling who wish to stop the player. Agents will chase the player and deactivate any activated stations. If the player runs into them too much, they lose the game.

Made by:

Mason Kubiak, Randy Le, Elroy Saltzherr

Sound Credits:

Freesound - "Level Up" by ImATaco
